alert.note: Alert for Elk; Greenwood; Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 11:17PM CDT until June 26 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Elk County in southeastern Kansas... Northwestern Wilson County in southeastern Kansas... Southwestern Woodson County in southeastern Kansas... Southeastern Greenwood County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 1215 AM CDT. * At 1116 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fall River, or 15 miles southeast of Eureka, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Toronto, Severy, Fall River, New Albany, Coyville, Fall River Lake, Cross Timbers State Park, Toronto Lake and Fall River State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
